title: R-multiverse topics
text: An R-multiverse topic is a list of packages that share a subject matter domain (for example, packages that fit Bayesian models).

title: R-multiverse topics
text:
New topics
To contribute a new topic, submit a pull request to add a topic listing file that describes the topic.

title: R-multiverse topics
text:
New packages
To contribute a new package to an existing topic, add the topic URL to the URL field of the DESCRIPTION file (example here), then create a new GitHub/GitLab release of the package.

title: Topic: bayesian
text:
This topic lists packages useful for conducting Bayesian Statistics: for example, fitting models with Markov chain Monte Carlo or summarizing posterior samples.



Package
Title




jagstargets
Targets for JAGS Pipelines


stantargets
Targets for Stan Workflows
